pkgmetadata.longdescription: The 08z series models that support this driver are: Lexmark X5630, Lexmark Z2420, Lexmark Z2490, Lexmark X3650, Lexmark X3690, Lexmark X4630, Lexmark X4650, Lexmark X4690, Lexmark X4950, Lexmark X4975ve, Lexmark X4975, Lexmark X5070, Lexmark X5075, Lexmark X5650, Lexmark X5690, Lexmark X6650, Lexmark X6675, Lexmark X6690, Lexmark X7675
